name: ham-radio-recorder
description: Ham radio recorder for scheduled monitoring: controls your rig via CAT/CI-V (WebSocket) and records received audio automatically.
author: okuyama@itcom.ne.jp

scripts.build: plasmo build && node scripts/inline-chunks.mjs && cp offscreen.html build/chrome-mv3-prod/
scripts.copy-offscreen: cp offscreen.html build/chrome-mv3-dev/ 2>/dev/null; cp offscreen.html build/chrome-mv3-prod/ 2>/dev/null; echo 'offscreen.html copied'
